mapper.sql: id, `uid`, province, city, area, detail_address, mobile, receiver_name, building_no, room_no, default_flag
mapper.select: select from user_address where uid = #{uid} and default_flag = true order by id desc limit 1
mapper.update: update user_address set default_flag = false where uid = #{uid} and default_flag = true
mapper.delete: delete from user_address where id = #{id} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into user_address (uid, province, city, area, detail_address, mobile, receiver_name, building_no, room_no, default_flag) values (#{uid}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{detailAddress}, #{mobile}, #{receiverName}, #{buildingNo}, #{roomNo}, #{defaultFlag})
